ygData.subject: RE: Has anyone dueled a magician?
ygData.msgSnippet: cool, when did they fix that?  i dueled a 50 ranger couple weeks ago (best attempt against melee yet, got her to 20 hp using only a lute) and after the fact
ygData.messageBody:
cool, when did they fix that? i dueled a 50 ranger couple weeks ago (best
attempt against melee yet, got her to 20 hp using only a lute) and after the
fact she was worried cause she asked if my songs were DoTs.

Shada


> Actually, CoD and DDD are fine to use. Dots won't make you
> lose xp anymore.
> (Both PC and NPC dots, from what I've seen.) However, if the
> dot kills them, the
> duel will be "canceled by their untimely death".
>
> As to the fear question: You won't get an answer out of me
> on that one, but...try it
> out.. :)
>
> -Lohengrin, 45th bard of Rallos Zek
